author: GameSpot
description:
IO Interactive has mastered its stealth gameplay with the Hitman series. So how will IO differentiate the iconic spy James Bond from Agent 47? CEO of IOI Hakan Abrak explains.

SUBSCRIBE https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbu2SsF-Or3Rsn3NxqODImw?sub_confirmation=1

0:00 – IO Interactive Joins GameSpot at Summer Game Fest
0:21 – Announcing Bond: Years in the Making
0:57 – From Independence to Iconic IPs
1:41 – How IO Landed the James Bond License
2:56 – Balancing Bond and Hitman
3:43 – The Key Differences Between Bond and Hitman
5:01 – Humor in Bond vs. Hitman’s Dark Comedy
6:19 – Bond’s Gameplay Style vs. Hitman’s Sandbox
7:54 – Storytelling Structure: Hitman vs. Bond
8:35 – Bond’s Combat, Charm & Gadgets
9:30 – Why IO Created a New Bond Instead of Using a Movie Version
11:01 – Building a Bond Origin Story from Scratch
11:28 – Mads Mikkelsen’s Role in Hitman & Bond Synergy
12:34 – Hitman Goes Co-op: Challenges and Potential
13:54 – Teaching Friends How to Play Hitman
14:46 – Could Bond
title: How IO Interactive Is Making James Bond Different From Hitman

author: GameSpot
description:
We're at Summer Games Fest 2025, and just finished covering the Xbox Showcase! Here are the trailers announced at the Xbox Showcase, including Persona 4 Revival, Gears of War Reloaded, Ninja Gaiden 4, Super Meat Boy 3D, and Call of Duty Black Ops 7!

00:00 ROG Xbox Ally
01:37 Call of Duty Black Ops 7
04:42 Persona 4 Revival
05:24 Gears of War Reloaded
07:03 Outer Wilds 2 - October 29 Release date
09:52 NINJA GAIDEN 4
11:37 Super Meat Boy 3D
12:42 Indiana Jones and the Great Circle The Order of Giants
14:16 High on Life 2
15:51 Resonance: A Plague Tale Legacy
17:28 The Blood of Dawnwalker
19:42 Beast of Reincarnation
21:18 Cronos The New Dawn
22:57 Clockwork Revolution 
28:24 MUDANG Two Hearts
30:40 Planet of Lana II Children of the Leaf
32:38 Aniimo
34:08 At Fate's End
35:54 Invincible VS
38:30 FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE INTERGRADE 
38:55 FINAL FANTASY XVI
40:29 Keeper

#GameSpot #Xbox #SGF2025
title: Best Xbox Games Showcase 2025 Trailers

author: GameSpot
description:
